casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE. No. 606A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 12, 2007. C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of April 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time for Court Reporter to Deliver Transcripts:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 9th day of May 2007 to prepare and deliver transcript *374to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of April 2007."
